"To accentuate the positive, the musical does not squander the charms of the movie. The lively pop-inflected score retains its appeal and has been considerably augmented with some fine if unremarkable additions...But aside from the appealing performances and the nicely varied score, 'Frozen' largely fails to impress...Whatâ€™s sorely lacking in 'Frozen' is the visionary stage magic that Julie Taymor brought to 'The Lion King.'"
